channel.title: Faint Whispers Apostle Ability
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I used faint whispers and started whispering other cult members. BD team accuses me of treason because they saw the whispers.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The ability is supposed to hide whisper notifications - I was an apostle, and the other cult player was a cult leader. All other players saw the whisper notifications, even though I clicked Faint Whispers and both I and the cult leader saw the chat notification that I had used the Faint Whispers ability.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Just click Faint Whispers during the day and have culties chat with each other. Other BD's should not see the notifications that the cultists are whispering to each other, but they do.
#### Comments:
